committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Oversight, Investigations and Emergency Management

official_title: Relating to the period of availability of certain emergency relief funds allocated under section 125 of title 23, United States Code, for carrying out a project to repair or reconstruct a portion of a Federal-aid primary route in San Mateo County, California.

summary.text: Devil's Slide Tunnel Act - Amends Federal highway provisions to make sums allocated for certain project alternatives available until expended (thus ensuring that funds already appropriated and obligated for Devil's Slide, a section of Highway 1 in San Mateo County, California, remain available to the California Department of Transportation to build a tunnel).

titles.title: Relating to the period of availability of certain emergency relief funds allocated under section 125 of title 23, United States Code, for carrying out a project to repair or reconstruct a portion of a Federal-aid primary route in San Mateo County, California.
